full_summary:
## Leadership Development Consultant Tender Notice

### Title and Reference Information
* Title: TSPS-1.7 Leadership Development Consultant
* Title (French): SPTS-1.7 Expert-conseil en perfectionnement du leadership
* Reference Number: cb-62-24379332
* Amendment Number: 2

### Invitation to Tender Information
* Solicitation Number: R0000146240
* Publication Date: March 5, 2024
* Tender Closing Date and Time: March 29, 2024 at 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
* Amendment Date: March 29, 2024

### Category and Scope of Work
* The Shared Services Canada (SSC) requires the services of a Leadership Development Consultant (TSPS Resource Category 1.7) to support the organization's leadership development needs.
* The Consultant will provide media training, coaching, and management education and training services to SSC employees.
* Language Requirements: English and French
* Security Level: Reliability
* Number of Resources: Multiple resources

### Procurement Information
* Procurement Category: Service (SRV)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Trade Agreements: Please refer to Tender Description or Tender Documents for details.

### Delivery Information
* Regions of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR), Canada

### Contact Information
* Contact Person: Julie Dessureault
* Contact Email: Julie.Dessureault@ssc-spc.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: 613-608-3114

### Tender Documents and Requirements
* The tendering process will be conducted under the Task and Solution Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement E60ZT-18TSPS/D.
* Suppliers on the permanent list who meet the qualification requirements are eligible to participate.
* The resulting Contract will begin at the contract award date and will end one year later, with three (3) additional one (1) year option periods.

Note: I have used markdown formatting to separate the sections and make it easier to read. I have also removed the unnecessary information and rephrased the content to make it more professional and concise. Let me know if you need any further assistance!
